alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 11:19AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Clay, southern York and northwestern Fillmore Counties through NOON CDT... At 1119 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sutton to near Clay Center. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Sutton, Clay Center, Exeter, Fairmont, Grafton, Ong, Saronville and Lushton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
